info.title: Google Drive API
info.description: API for interacting with Google Drive, focusing on creating files.

post.description: Creates a new file. This method supports an /upload URI and accepts uploaded media.

parameters.name: uploadType
parameters.description: The type of upload request to the /upload URI. Required for media uploads.

parameters.name: enforceSingleParent
parameters.description: Deprecated. Creating files in multiple folders is no longer supported.

parameters.name: ignoreDefaultVisibility
parameters.description: Whether to ignore the domain's default visibility settings for the created file.

parameters.name: keepRevisionForever
parameters.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. Applicable only to files with binary content.

parameters.name: ocrLanguage
parameters.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code).

parameters.name: supportsAllDrives
parameters.description: Whether the requesting application supports both My Drives and shared drives.

parameters.name: useContentAsIndexableText
parameters.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text.

parameters.name: includePermissionsForView
parameters.description: Specifies which additional view's permissions to include in the response. Only 'published' is supported.

parameters.name: includeLabels
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of IDs of labels to include in the labelInfo part of the response.

requestBody.description: File object that needs to be added to Google Drive

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive: View and manage the files in your Google Drive
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.ap: View and manage its own configuration data in your Google Drive
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.fi: View and manage Google Drive files and folders that you have opened or created with this app
